name: ux
content: <!--{ZONE}-->	<WAREHOUSE LOCATION="<tkBookmark collection="perf" name="wpa"/>" />	<HISTORY TABLE="Disk" Interval="5" RETAIN="24" EXPORT="5" USE="A" />	<HISTORY TABLE="Disk_Performance" Interval="5" RETAIN="24" EXPORT="5" USE="A" />	<HISTORY TABLE="System" Interval="5" RETAIN="24" EXPORT="5" USE="A" />	<HISTORY TABLE="Network" Interval="5" RETAIN="24" EXPORT="5" USE="A" />	<HISTORY TABLE="Unix_Memory" Interval="5" RETAIN="24" EXPORT="5" USE="A" />	<HISTORY TABLE="SMP_CPU" Interval="5" RETAIN="24" EXPORT="5" USE="A" />
